<title level="1" right="Rules">[Senses](/Rules.aspx?ID=2883)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Choose or design any special senses for your creature, such as [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), or [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33). If you’re making a sense from scratch, simply decide what it senses, whether it has a range limit, and whether it’s [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=2406) or [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=2407). For example, a [sinspawn](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=91) has “sin scent (imprecise) 30 feet.” This means it can smell creatures bearing its associated sin if they’re within 30 feet, and the sense is imprecise—about as acute as human hearing.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
